name: linear
title: Linear
description: Manage issues and projects in Linear
setup_instructions: To connect Linear, you need a Personal API Key from your Linear account.

fields.name: api_key
fields.label: API Key
fields.help:
1. Open Linear and click your profile (bottom left)
2. Go to Settings > Security & access
3. Scroll to 'Personal API keys'
4. Click 'Create key' and copy it
